frame.name: Tetris Classic Game
frame.subtitle: A Modern Twist on a Retro Classic
frame.description: Experience the legendary block-stacking puzzle, rebuilt from the ground up for Farcaster! Maneuver falling Tetriminos with W, A, S, and D to create solid horizontal lines. Clear lines to boost your score, level up, and master the increasing speed. Press 'P' to pause the action. How high can you score?
